ygData.subject: Re: Fizzles and faltering spells late in lvl
ygData.msgSnippet: I started having this problem at Lvl 20 and assumed it was differences in the level spells but I m not so sure... Wonder if they snuck a change in on Wizards
ygData.messageBody:
I started having this problem at Lvl 20 and assumed it was differences in
the level spells but I'm not so sure... Wonder if they snuck a change in on
Wizards that is affecting this..

-----Original Message-----
From: Karl Hatteland [mailto:karlh@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 3:13 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Fizzles and faltering spells late in lvl

From: "Karl Hatteland" <karlh@...>

When I became lvl 12 I went to lavastorm and began to hunt Dragons. Good
loot and xp. I rooted them and then shoot them. I used Shock of lightning.
Then when I was half way to lvl 13 the root began to fail. And each time I
got hurt more and more. And my lightning spell began to fizzel both 4 and 5
times a row and I had only to run to zone. Now I am a half bubble from lvl
13 after dieing quite a bit.
I wonder why the root falters and the Shock of lightning began to fizzle
when my skill is maxed on lvl and I was almost 13. Not in the start before
my skill became maxed. Is this to make us wiz harder to lvl?

Thanks for any reply

Avari lvl12 soon 13 Wiz Fenin ro
And now excelent in Old Erudin
